Description:
EX-DISPLAY HOME IN FIRST CLASS LOCATION
This quality 4 bedroom home located within walking distance to the new soon to open Craigieburn Shopping Centre, parks, lakes and all other amenities, is sure to impress the fussy buyer.
From the moment you enter you will see the spacious formal entrance leading to a fantastic hostess kitchen with Caesar stone bench tops, s/s appliances including dishwasher, walk in pantry, adjoining meals and large family area with gas log fire.
Separate lounge / rumpus room, lovely decked under cover entertaining area with BBQ and double garage.
All year comforts with ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm system, landscaped gardens and much more!
This home is sure to impress

Description:
'LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION'
This beautifully 3 bedroom BV home is an excellent opportunity for first home buyers or investors.
Situated within walking distance to schools, the new proposed shopping centre, Golf Course
and transport.
Comprising:
3 good size bedrooms, formal “L” shaped lounge and dining combination,
well equipped kitchen with gas appliances, adjoining meals area and family room, bright centrally located bathroom, double carport under the same roof line with rear access to a huge undercover entertaining area, good size backyard and landscaped gardens.
Features:
all fixed floor coverings, evaporative cooling, gas ducted heating, elegant curtains, gas
appliances, rangehood, gas hot water service and more!
Your inspection a must!

WELCOME HOME!!!! AFFORDABLE DOUBLE STOREY
Excellent opportunity to purchase this beautiful double storey home within walking distance to schools, shops, transport and parks.

formal entrance hallway leading to a spacious hostess kitchen, adjoining spacious meals with access to an Alfresco, large living room, huge rumpus room, 4 fantastic size bedrooms, two separate master bedrooms with dual access each to a bathroom, roomy laundry, two powder rooms, double remote garage with internal access and drive through access to a huge workshop.
Extras: ducted heating, alarm system, verticals, gas hot plates, wall oven, high ceilings throughout, low maintenance landscaped gardens finishes off this comfortable home.
For inspection please call: Romeo Sassine 0411 882 605.

Description:
Under Instructions from the Mortgagee
Set on a generous corner allotment measuring 508m2 approx. this single level brick veneer home is as new and offers comfort and space for the growing family.
Comprising separate entrance, two living zones including formal lounge and an informal family room and meals area adjoining a quality kitchen with stone bench top. Four great size bedrooms all with BIR's, ensuite & WIR's to master bedroom, second bathroom, internal laundry plus a large double garage with rear drive thru access and internal access.

Description:
Impressive Family Proportions and Premium Lifestyle
Nestled in a blissfully quiet family friendly neighbourhood across from the picturesque Craigieburn Public Golf Course. This impressive two storey residence is a stroke of architectural genius optimising the best of contemporary living, with its open-plan design, luxury appointments and sublime alfresco dining amongst its expansive garden surrounds.
Framed by ceramic tiled floors, high ceilings and huge windows capturing a breathtaking outlook, the vast and versatile interior offers 4 robed bedrooms and study, (master with a stylish ensuite and walk in robe),a family sized bathroom, multiple living areas and an open plan kitchen meals and living domain. The designer kitchen with its state of the art appointments includes stone benchtops, Blanco stainless steel appliances and dishwasher, a walk in pantry as well as ample storage, not to mention a grand island bench overlooking a meals/living and additional rumpus room that offers inside and outside alfresco entertaining.
This stately residence also features a guest powder room, family sized laundry, outdoor integrated BBQ, an expansive double garage with internal access and a storage shed. Additionally appointed with evaporative cooling, ducted heating, ducted vacuum, inbuilt Foxtel points, modern pendant lighting and security alarm with camera. All of this sitting on a decent sized beautifully manicured allotment (793sqm). In an enviable position with Craigieburn Central, Craigieburn Sporting Club and Golf Course, Primary and Secondary Schools and Craigieburn train station only a short distance away.
Insights: 8 Moonah Place, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
First home or Investment Perfection!
LJ Hooker Craigieburn is proud to present 21 Powell Street Craigieburn. Situated in the ever popular Highlands Estate this is the place to call home. Once you step foot inside this family home you are greeted with a spacious master bedroom showcasing a walk in robe and ensuite as well as two additional sizeable bedrooms serviced by a main central bathroom with bath. With shops, schools, public transport and many other services in close proximity this is the place to call home.

Description:
A MODERN TOWNHOME WITH A BLISSFUL OUTLOOK
First impressions count and this stylish town home with parkland views located in a desirable lifestyle location certainly delivers.
Enjoying its own street frontage, you're immediately struck by the use of light and space inside this bright and beautiful residence, which introduces a radiant open-plan living domain, crafted with high ceilings above and bathed with plenty of natural light.
The seamless integration between the fashion-forward interior and oversized balcony makes entertaining possible, kitchen with stainless steel appliances, stone benchtop and dishwasher. Two robed bedrooms downstairs and a bright main bathroom are zoned in privacy downstairs.
Offering modern comfort, this fantastic first home or investment option features a upstairs powder room, beautiful parkland views, split-system heating and cooling. separate laundry, rear courtyard with internal and external access to the single lock-up garage.
Situated in the most popular pocket of Craigieburn and close to public transport, shopping centres, schools, parklands, sport facilities, recreational facilities and much more.

This exceptional residence provides a ready-to-enjoy family lifestyle with its free-flowing design, impressive living/entertaining areas & blissfully quiet cul-de-sac location.
Absolutely immaculate from start to finish, the home's inviting interior highlights a large master bedroom with walk-in robe & private ensuite, 3 additional bedrooms (all with built-in robes), large study, main family bathroom & separate WC.
Formal & informal living zones include an elegant front lounge & spacious open family/dining area leading out to the enormous al-fresco style entertaining room, perfect for the all seasons entertainer.
Other stand-out features include a well-appointed stone-top kitchen with ample cupboard & bench space, dishwasher & deep pantry, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, plantation shutters, beautiful timber floors, family-sized laundry & linen storeroom. Step outside to discover a great sized backyard with leafy outlook, low maintenance surrounds & a double garage with drive-thru access.
Located within a short stroll to Schools, shops, parklands, golf course & public transport. This home is sure to tick every single box on your must-have wish list!

Description:
Individuality, Luxury & Space
This delightful home offers a contemporary design with an emphasis on open plan living and ample outdoor entertaining areas are just some of the attractions of this modern home.
Comprising: 3 generous bedrooms, master with en suite and walk in robe, lounge flows through to a sun drenched family/dining area highlighted by a wall of sliding doors overlooking the captivating entertaining area, large modern kitchen with quality appliances, Formal living area, sunny bathroom, separate laundry and 2 WCs,
Enjoying the privacy and peacefulness you would expect but only minutes to Craigieburn Central, all levels of schooling and train station at your door step makes this the ideal position perfect home.
Features: floorboards, gas ducted heating, air conditioning, security system and a remote double brick garage.

Description:
Relax, Entertain & Enjoy.....
You will be the envy of all your friends with this "one of a kind" stylish family home. Offering a comfortable lifestyle of space and quality ideally located within walking distance to the train station, local schools and shops. Just some of the features on hand include: Well-equipped large kitchen with stainless steel appliances & dishwasher overlooking the open plan meals/family area, ducted heating and evaporative cooling, step down formal lounge with cedar lined cathedral ceilings, master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, high ceilings, polished timber floor boards, study/formal dining, oversized carport providing plenty of room for storage of the boat, caravan or trailer.
Step outside to discover a large resort-style backyard featuring a solar-heated pool with an enclosed alfresco area perfect for those who like to entertain all year round on a large allotment of approximately 650m2. All this in a friendly, quiet and secure location, This home really is the complete package. Don't let this opportunity pass you by. This one won't hang around for long. Call now for inspection
